text: "As the Days Go By" is a 1988 song by Australian singer Daryl Braithwaite and is the leading single from his second studio album Edge. It went to number 11 in Australia, number 49 in New Zealand and was released as a single in the United Kingdom. It was included on the soundtrack to the 1992 movie Peter's Friends. ==Track listing== ;CD single (1988) # "As The Days Go By" – 4:04 # "In My Life" – 5:07 Category:1988 songs Category:Pop rock songs
title: As the Days Go By
